title: Conduct SOX Compliance Check
description: A compliance officer needs to verify that a specific financial transaction followed the required approval workflow.

tasks.description: Retrieve the transaction details and its associated audit trail.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully pulls the complete history for the specified transaction.

tasks.description: Compare the audit trail against the documented SOX approval policy for that transaction type.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the transaction was approved by two authorized managers as per policy.

tasks.description: Log the result of the compliance check in the audit management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs a 'Pass' result for the compliance test.
